id: # Example: Chained orders - buy low, then sell high
# When btc_buy fills, btc_sell will be automatically enabled
# id: Unique identifier for this configuration
# pair: Kraken trading pair (XXBTZUSD for BTC/USD, XETHZUSD for ETH/USD)
# threshold_price: Price threshold that triggers the TSL order
# direction: "buy" or "sell" - direction of TSL order
# trailing_offset_percent: Trailing stop offset as percentage (e.g., 5.0 for 5%)
# linked_order_id: (Optional) ID of order to enable when this order fills
